item.title: Pro-tip: grep through terminal history
item.description: Might seem like a stupid little trick, but... On a mac, if you want to grep your terminal scrollback (as opposed to using search). command-a (select all), command-c (copy), then: 1 pbpaste | grep <WHAT YOU ARE LOOKING FOR>
